overview: Do it, feel it and never regret it. You only live once so make it count! In #Selfies 2.0, you'll see girls have girl on girl sex for the first time, another girl screws a stranger and a couple fucks in the middle of the party! Watch as these hot girls lose their inhibitions and live life to the fullest. One party. One phone. That's what #YOLO is all about.
tagline: One Phone One Party. #YOLO, You Only LIve Once.
title: Selfies 2.0
